Context:
The text mentions that "ASD & Friends" is a group for students with lived experience of Autism. They offer mentorship programs where peer mentors help students navigate wellness and blend lived experience with expertise of mental health practitioners to develop goals for growth. Students can find support and safe spaces in these programs.

There are also contact details provided: 416-415-2000, TTY: 1-877-515-5559, email: ask.george@georgebrown.ca. The text advises visitors to sign up for updates about application deadlines, college news, upcoming events, tours, and more.

Additionally, there is a mention of "Peer Mentor+ wellness programs" and a link to learn more about them. Lastly, the text includes a notice that the information contained on the website is subject to change without notice and students should verify George Brown College fee requirements.
